Title: Pitching In
Description:
The yaungol's siege weapons - those ballista spearthrowers down there - are tearing apart our defenses both at Longying Oupost and in Kun-Lai Summit.

Those terrible weapons must be destroyed.

Take these explosives. I've covered them in the pitch that you collected.

Toss them at those ballistas, and we'll give the yaungol a little taste of their own medicine.
ObjectivesText: Use Ban's Explosives to destroy 6 Osul Ballistas.
CompletionText: Fire is a cruel weapon. Luckily, we are only using it to destroy weapons of war.
RewardText:
Good, $c.

Now that they cannot hide behind their siege weapons, they have no choice but to face us.
